title: Domain Password Expiry
description: How to handle expired or soon-to-expire domain passwords.

steps.title: Use CTRL+ALT+DEL
steps.instruction: While logged in, press Ctrl+Alt+Del and select 'Change a password' to update before it expires.

steps.title: Web Portal Reset
steps.instruction: If already expired, use the official company self-service password reset portal from a mobile device.

steps.title: Update Stored Credentials
steps.instruction: After changing, remember to update the password on your phone (Email), VPN, and Wi-Fi settings.

steps.title: Clear Windows Credentials
steps.instruction: Search for 'Credential Manager' in Windows → Windows Credentials → Remove old enterprise entries.

steps.title: Restart to Sync
steps.instruction: Restart your machine while connected to the office network or VPN to synchronize the new password locally.
